title: EmailUnsubscribeEvent
description: Whenever a recipient requests not to receive your emails anymore.

id.description: A guid that represents the identifier of the EmailUnsubscribeEvent on the notification platform.

version.description: A text that describe the version of de EmailUnsubscribeEvent.

source.description: A text that represents the project where the EmailUnsubscribeEvent is located.

contentType.description: A text that represents a mime type of the content.

type.description: A text that describe the full name of the EmailUnsubscribeEvent on the Notification.Api.External.

schema.description: A URI which addressed a Json File that describe the EmailUnsubscribeEvent structure.

description.description: A text that describe the EmailUnsubscribeEvent.
examples: The message has not been delivered
